activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.

ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The work'e'r is building a wall.
Apply plast'e'r on the bricks evenly.
Does this trainee usually use the hamm'e'r carefully?
Does this cam'e'ra always help us detect the leaks?

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular, Yes/No questions, WH-questions

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

tables: What kind of food does he cook?

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Indian dishes on Tuesday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Indian dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: She prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Thai dishes on Monday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Thai dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares Thai dishes on Tuesday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare German dishes on Thursday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare German dishes?
example_dialogues.text_d: He prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare German dishes on Thursday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare German dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares German dishes on Wednesday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Swiss dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Swiss dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Swiss dishes on Friday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Ann prepare Sri Lankan dishes on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When does she prepare Sri Lankan dishes?
dialogues.text_d: She prepares Sri Lankan dishes on Sunday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare French dishes on Wednesday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare French dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares French dishes on Thursday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Japanese dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Japanese dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Japanese dishes on Saturday.

dialogues.text_a: Does Muhamed prepare Indian dishes on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When does he prepare Indian dishes?
dialogues.text_d: He prepares Indian dishes on Monday.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Does Arun learn about construction site safety on Monday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he learns about roof tiling.

content.sentence: Does he follow a class on building materials and measurements on Tuesday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he follows a class on concrete mixing.

content.sentence: Does Arun have a session on bricklaying and blockwork on Wednesday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he has a session on building materials science.
content.answer: No, he doesn’t, but he has a session on building materials science.

content.sentence: Does he attend a carpentry and joinery lesson on Thursday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he attends a vehicle servicing lesson.

content.sentence: Does Arun study concrete mixing and pouring methods on Friday morning?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he studies site safety regulations.

content.sentence: Does he practise foundations and footings on Monday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he practises design systems.

content.sentence: Does Arun join a session on scaffolding and ladder safety on Tuesday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he joins a session on engine assembly.

content.sentence: Does he learn about roofing and truss design on Wednesday before lunch?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he learns about measurements and surveying.
content.answer: No, he doesn’t, but he learns about measurements and surveying.

content.sentence: Does Arun take part in floor tiling practice on Thursday afternoon?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he takes part in brake repair.

content.sentence: Does he check the tools and materials on Tuesday afternoon?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he checks floor laying and finishings.
content.answer: No, he doesn’t, but he checks floor laying and finishings.

content.sentence: Does Arun repair doors and window frames on Monday afternoon?
options: No, he doesn’t, but he repairs grouting.

activity_b.text: Does he follow a class on building materials and measurements on Tuesday morning?
Does Arun have a session on bricklaying and blockwork on Wednesday morning?
Does he attend a carpentry and joinery lesson on Thursday morning?
Does Arun study concrete mixing and pouring methods on Friday morning?
Does he practise foundations and footings on Monday before lunch?
Does Arun join a session on scaffolding and ladder safety on Tuesday before lunch?
Does he learn about roofing and truss design on Wednesday before lunch?
Does Arun take part in floor tiling practice on Thursday afternoon?
Does he check the tools and materials on Tuesday afternoon?
Does Arun repair doors and window frames on Monday afternoon?

activity_a.text:
Match the words to their definitions.
පදයන් ඔවුන්ගේ අර්ථයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
சொற்களை அவற்றின் வரையறைகளுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_b.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_e.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.item_b: a small tool used for spreading cement or plaster
the work of building with bricks or stones
a hard hat worn for protection on a site
covering walls with a smooth cement surface
the correct straight position of a wall or structure
a technical drawing that shows how a building will be made

Questions.question: What time does Nirmala arrive at the Construction Technology section?
Does Nirmala have Building Materials and Measurements on Wednesday morning?
What does she do on Friday afternoon?
Questions.answer: She works on Masonry and Plastering.
options: She works on Masonry and Plastering.

Questions.question: Does she use the tools before the instructor gives instructions?
Does Nirmala leave anything on the table after lunch?
options: Only when she is in a hurry.

activity_c.text: Every weekday, Nirmala arrives at the Construction Technology section at a quarter to eight.
Does she come late?
No, she doesn’t.
She always comes early because she wants to check the tools and materials before class.
She stands in line with the other trainees for the morning assembly.
She doesn’t talk while the instructor takes attendance, and gives short safety reminders about construction sites.
The timetable shows theory sessions in the morning and practical sessions in the afternoon.
On Mondays, Nirmala studies Construction Safety and Site Rules.
On Wednesday morning, she learns about Building Materials and Measurements.
Does she enjoy it?
Yes, she does.
She likes to measure walls and draw simple building plans.
On Friday afternoon, she works on the Masonry and Plastering practical.
She doesn’t skip any task because every session helps her improve her skills.
At 8:30 a.m., the first class starts.
Does Nirmala go to the site first?
No, she doesn’t.
She stays in the classroom for theory.
She doesn’t use the trowel or hammer before the instructor gives instructions.
Her instructor wants her to study the drawing and safety notes first.
At 10:45, Nirmala has a tea break.
She usually drinks plain tea in the canteen.
But sometimes she sits near the workshop with her friends.
Do they eat buns every day?
No, they don’t.
They have buns only on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.
After the break, Nirmala goes to the training site.
She uses different tools and follows safety procedures carefully.
She doesn’t forget her helmet or gloves.
Her instructor walks around and checks her wall alignment and plastering work.
She eats lunch at 12:30 and cleans her table.
She doesn’t leave any waste behind, even if she is in a hurry.
The day ends at 4:15 p.m.
Does she feel tired?
Yes, she does, but she feels proud because she learns something new every day.

She stands in line with the other trainees for the morning assembly.
She doesn’t talk while the instructor takes attendance, and gives short safety reminders about construction sites.
On Mondays, Nirmala studies Construction Safety and Site Rules.
She doesn’t skip any task because every session helps her improve her skills.
She doesn’t use the trowel or hammer before the instructor gives instructions.
She usually drinks plain tea in the canteen.
But sometimes she sits near the workshop with her friends.
She uses different tools and follows safety procedures carefully.
She doesn’t forget her helmet or gloves.
